body_html:
Thanks for pointing this out.

Support for big-endian architecture was added by @namrata-ibm in commit 1e44b15
Support for big-endian architectures in TensorFlow is community driven and we don't test that as part of every release at this time.

@namrata-ibm : Could you take a look? Seems like this is the line that is failing:

tensorflow/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/cast_op_test.py

Line 147 in 87cdfaf

self._compare(np.inf, np.int32, i4.max, False)

Support for big-endian architectures in TensorFlow is community driven and we don't test that as part of every release at this time.

body:
Thanks for pointing this out.

Support for big-endian architecture was added by @namrata-ibm in commit 1e44b15ff
Support for big-endian architectures in TensorFlow is community driven and we don't test that as part of every release at this time.

@namrata-ibm : Could you take a look? Seems like this is the line that is failing:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/87cdfafd44ff5e332fd820608783432fea83a4c9/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/cast_op_test.py#L147
